aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-5453-905 at Base Bravo

defect_observed.value: Fuel control unit drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 18/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 19/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 20/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 24/08/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/08/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
